title: SURPRISE! BONUS DRAFT: Movies Based On True Stories + Morgan2 Burned Her Ex’s Clothes + What’s Wrong with People?: Dangerous TikTok Trend
itunes:title: SURPRISE! BONUS DRAFT: Movies Based On True Stories + Morgan2 Burned Her Ex’s Clothes + What’s Wrong with People?: Dangerous TikTok Trend
description:
Happy Friday! We celebrate the weekend with a bonus draft of movies based on true stories…it causes a bit of controversy. In our "What’s Wrong With People?" segment, there's a dangerous new trend police are warning people about on TikTok. We learn something new about Morgan2 and what she did to get back at an ex-boyfriend. Also, a woman went viral after she posted a video of her confessing she drove her kids to school…but actually forget them at home! Amy and Eddie sympathize with her!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
